# Compare runtimes by GSE

# Load metadata

```{r}
load("./Documents/GitHub/recount-methylation-analysis/files/data/mdpost_all-gsm-md.rda")

```

# Example: GSE93933

Obtain records for the study from the metadata file `mdpost`.

```{r}
gseid <- "GSE93933"
gsmv <- mdpost[mdpost$gseid == gseid,]$gsm
dlinfo <- recountmethylation::gds_idatquery(gsmv, dfp = gseid, 
                                            expand = TRUE)
```
